data.title: Cast Biographies: JUSTIN CARROLL
data.meta_description: The ePassions Insider. A well-designed Passions website that is dedicated to the finest soap opera of them all... Passions! Photo galleries, cast biographies, the Citizens of Harmony, and even Sheridan's diary, this place will really keep you occupied! Read through Jessica's Journal or Sheridan's Diary. Are you addicted? Find out in our feature -are u addicted- ! See large proofs of TV Guide's special Passions covers! Come in and experience the passion for yourself...
data.text:
Justin Carroll plays "David Hastings," a mysterious man who is being blackmailed by Ivy (Kim Johnston Ulrich) and who claims he is Grace Bennett's (Dana Sparks) pre-amnesia husband. David is father to John (Jack Krizmanich.

Carroll, who is half-Irish and half-English, was raised in Greece, London and Rome. His mother is the former British television actress Angelina Halley and his father is the renowned travel author, Michael Carroll. His most recent television role was Nigel Gibney on Showtime's "Beggars and Choosers." His other credits include the films "To Protect and Serve," "Shame" and the short-film, which he wrote and produced, "Which Way to Oz?" Justin is also a stand-up comic, who plays regularly at comedy clubs in Los Angeles.

Carroll is single and lives his Los Angeles with his dogs. He enjoys kickboxing and writing. Justin was born on September 25.

Official Website
